variables.value: How much of a fight can Northbright, Kyushu's rising stars,\nput up against the unbeatable Raimon?
Last year, they rebuilt their team around <FUL:SORAMIYA>,\na seventh grader already showing huge promise.
Their game's looking sharper than ever!
There it is! Northbright's play is flawless!
Thanks to their methodical training,\neach player's tactical skills are on point!
They've got talent oozing from every player,\nand <FFC:SORAMIYA> shines the brightest!
Approaching from a blind spot,\nhe hides his presence and approaches undetected.
Yes, a freshman at Raimon Junior High...\nand son of the legendary <FUL:ENDO>.
A Football Monster who's mastered every skill\nthrough natural athleticism and inherited talent.
He's making his official debut in this match.
Think Raimon, think <LST:HARU>!\nYou'd never guess it's his first match!
It feels like I'm watching his father!\nThis could very well be the birth of a new legend!
You'll become the kind of player\nwho captivates everyone around you...
He can't be stopped!! It's a one-on-one!
Number 10, <LST:HARU>!\nA spectacular solo effort and a stunning goal!
Raimon scores the opening goal\njust one minute into the game!
Barely into his debut,\nand he already has the aura of a champion.
Overwhelming strength and presence...\nHe possesses all the qualities needed in a player.
The match that was supposed to be the highlight of the\ntournament ended 6-0...! What a blowout...!
Can anyone bring down Raimon's unshakable fortress?!
While Raimon Junior High has left the stage,\nNorthbright's eleven are still frozen on the pitch...!
How was it? Your first official match.
<FUL:UNMEI>...\nWaiting for the day you rise to face me...
Huh...? That's awfully timid of you.
You are... merely a projection of <FUL:HARU>,\naren't you?
You took a step toward me today...\nOn the path we must walk...
...to take down the Football Monster—\nThe one and only <FUL:HARU>.
Don't play dumb.\nDeep down, that's exactly what you want.
There's no way I can reach a level like that.
And what level would that be?
Be the Football Hero who takes down the Football Monster!
Exactly.\nAnd every hero needs his allies.
With them fighting alongside you...\nYou'll become that hero.
That, is where our path to glory begins...
Aaah! The <FUL:HARU> Fanclub is gaining\ntons of new members again!
Well, he won the Spring Cup with a huge lead,\nnot to mention the MVP and Rookie of the Year awards!
That dude is beyond a Football Monster— \nhe is a true thoroughbred.
He's a superstar now—\ncute, talented, the whole package.
He's such a big deal,\nit's like he's untouchable.
How long are you planning to stick around?
We're trying to get changed here...
Not in the mood for practice, huh?
Not that you really need it, though.
Football just... isn't as fun as it used to be.
I guess that's what they call a slump?\nI don't even know what football is to me anymore.
It's true that Raimon's unstoppable right now.
No wonder we haven't had any real heart-pounding matches.
Ever since Raimon's rise to fame...
...top talents from across Japan have been\nflocking here for pro-level training.
25 years ago, Raimon was another weak team,\nbut your dad turned it into Japan's best in just a year—
So who's to say another star won't rise\nand carry the torch? Right?
You've got the wrong idea about me, <FST:REN>.\nI'm not really looking for a strong rival.
I just want to make friends...
Thanks to <FST:HARU>, the already powerful Raimon\nhas become even stronger.
Being strong is not a bad thing.
But shine too brightly,\nand you might burn everything around you.
I think we should... keep an eye on him.
